Package Game.Interfaces

Interface Map

All Known Implementing Classes:
MapImp
public interface Map
Represents a map of rooms

    • shortestPath

      Iterator<Room> shortestPath(Room start, Room end)
      Returns the shortest path between two rooms
      Parameters:
      start - the start room
      end - the end room
      Returns:
      The iterator of the shortest path

    • shortestPathWeight

      double shortestPathWeight(Room start, Room end)
      Returns the weight of the shortest path between two rooms
      Parameters:
      start - the start room
      end - the end room
      Returns:
      the weight of the shortest path

    • mapShuffle

      void mapShuffle() throws EnemyException
      Shuffles the map Only the enemies that are not in fight with the hero can be removed
      Throws:
      EnemyException - if the enemy cannot be removed

    • updateWeight

      void updateWeight(Room vertex1, Room vertex2, double newWeight)
      Updates the weight of a connection between two rooms
      Parameters:
      vertex1 - the first room
      vertex2 - the second room
      newWeight - the new weight of the connection

    • areConnected

      boolean areConnected(Room room1, Room room2)
      verifies if two rooms are connected
      Parameters:
      room1 - the first room
      room2 - the second room
      Returns:
      true if the rooms are connected, false otherwise

    • getRooms

      UnorderedListADT<Room> getRooms()
      Returns an iterator of the rooms
      Returns:
      the iterator of the rooms

    • addRoom

      void addRoom(Room room) throws RoomException
      Adds a room to the map
      Parameters:
      room - the room to add
      Throws:
      RoomException - if the room is null

    • addConnection

      void addConnection(Room room1, Room room2, double weight) throws RoomException, IllegalArgumentException
      Adds a connection between two rooms
      Parameters:
      room1 - the first room
      room2 - the second room
      weight - the weight of the connection always from room1 to room2
      Throws:
      RoomException - if the rooms are null
      IllegalArgumentException - if the weight is negative

    • getRoomByName

      Room getRoomByName(String name)
      Returns the room by its name
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the room
      Returns:
      the room with the given name
